articles.content: India fast bowler Mohammed Shami returned to outdoor training after a gap of close to three months. The right-arm pacer along with Jasprit Bumrah and Ishant Sharma forms an Indian pace attack that is… [+2024 chars]

articles.author: Dattajirao Gaekwad
articles.title: Always a cover fielder, my job was to take on his famous square-cuts - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Weekes was a solid batsman. He particularly had a very good stroke through the covers when he used to bend his knee and hit. I used to always field in the covers. I had the best view.
articles.content:
Everton Weekes was a prolific batsman and got runs wherever he played. Against India he batted at another level—seven centuries in 10 Tests.
When I went to the West Indies in 1953 he played against … [+3304 chars]
